long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Play more games on the top-left menu.

Retro Bowl College takes the beloved Retro Bowl experience to a new level, immersing players in the dynamic world of college football. Developed by New Star Games, this installment allows you to guide a college team through the ranks, blending strategic management with on-field action. Dive into the nostalgia of classic gaming as you recruit players, plan plays, and aim for glory on the college gridiron.

Game Controls
Touch Controls: Utilize touch gestures to navigate menus, make selections, and control players during matches on mobile devices.
On-Screen Buttons: Execute actions such as passing, running, and tackling through intuitive on-screen buttons.

How to Play
Create Your Team: Begin by selecting or creating your college team, setting the foundation for your football journey.
Recruit Players: Scout and recruit talented players to build a competitive and diverse team roster.
Team Management: Handle player contracts, training regimes, and strategic planning to elevate your team’s performance.
On-Field Action: Control your players during matches, making crucial decisions to secure victories and climb the college football ranks.
Championship Aspirations: Compete in leagues and tournaments, striving to win championships and earn recognition in the college football world.
